main event: A civilian observed a star-like object traveling across the sky before it made a turn and disappeared on January 30, 1967.
interesting points: The object was watched for 3-4 minutes during which it displayed unusual movement patterns,It appeared to stop mid-flight for a brief moment, then resumed its motion,No sound was reported during the sighting,The observer described the object as having a bright, steady glow unlike any known aircraft,At least 3 other witnesses were present.
